estate_title: Home Designed With A Minimalist Style Exuding Luxury And Elegance
description: Designed by Zherow Architects, Faza Home is located in the town of Vadakara, Kerala. With a site area of 17 Cents and a built-up area of 3150 sq.ft, the 4-bedroom residence- Faza Home designed with a minimalist style exuding luxury and elegance. The brief given by the client was to design a home that was open and facilitated natural ventilation into all areas.

estate_title: A Guide to the Types of Homes You Can Buy
description: Many homebuyers have some idea of what theyâ€™re looking for in their dream home. You may have a specific location or design in mind. But what about the type of home? Are you looking for something single-family or multi-family?

This luxurious apartment offers breathtaking views and upscale amenities. Featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, gourmet kitchen, spa-inspired bathroom, and concierge services, this apartment provides the ultimate in urban living.

This senior living community offers a vibrant and engaging lifestyle for retirees. Featuring spacious apartments, wellness center, social activities, and on-site dining, residents can enjoy a fulfilling retirement experience.

This modern townhouse offers contemporary design and convenience in a prime location. Featuring open floor plan, rooftop terrace, attached garage, and state-of-the-art appliances, this townhouse is ideal for urban living.

estate_title: Transforming a home into an experience
description: feature a combination of elegance and rustic country styling. Often built with stone or brick, natural warm tones are carried throughout.

estate_title: Costs to Know About When Purchasing a New Home
description: Builders often require a deposit, which can range from 5-20% of the home's value, depending on the builder's policies and the cost of the home. This deposit helps cover building materials, contractor labor, the land cost, and permits.

estate_title: Luxury Single-Family Home with Panoramic Views
description: This exquisite single-family home offers unparalleled luxury and stunning panoramic views. Featuring spacious living areas, gourmet kitchen, private pool, and lush landscaping, this home is perfect for those seeking the ultimate in comfort and elegance.
